commands.speaker: You
commands.line: One, two, three, four. And!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Pose! That's it!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Whew. That was perfect, wasn't it?

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: W-We did the part I was most worried about perfectly.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: We did it, zura!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Everyone, here's a towel and a drink!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Thanks. Ahh, that's so refreshing.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: The dance was awesome! Not only was it perfect, but it was intense! My heart clenched just watching!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Thanks. That gives me a lot of confidence.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: We're still only in the practice phase though.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I know. But if it's this perfect in practice, it almost scares me to think of how amazing it'll be on stage.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: This is nothing compared what it'll be like on stage. Once it's complete, our dance will create a magic wave from the earth and envelope all mankind in--

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Yeah, yeah. Wipe the sweat off your brow, zura.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: The dance is perfect, so now we can head into our performance the day after tomorrow with confidence!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Right. The song is wonderful, too.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: *Chuckle*

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: So, what now? Should we give it one more go?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: That is a good idea. We won't be able to practice much once the festival starts tomorrow.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: So that means today is the last day we can practice.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Then let's practice as best we can for the show.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: We'll start from the top in 15 minutes then.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I can hear the taiko drums again today.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: The drummers are practicing seriously for the festival, too. They're playing both days.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: The sound of drums reverberates in my tummy, and it feels so good. I want to hear it up close.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: This is the last time we'll walk home to this music, too. It's kind of sad.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: You can still hear it when you get home, can't you?

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: You don't get it, Yoshiko, zura. Feeling the changing of time and seasons is the way of the Japanese heart, zura.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: It really makes me mad how you say that with such a smug face.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: I think I get that. I'm looking forward to the Summer Festival, but the prep work was a lot of fun, so it's kind of sad it's ending.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: They say the most fun happens before something begins.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: It's like I only heard about the Summer Festival yesterday. Time sure flies, huh?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Well everyone, tomorrow is the big day. Sleep early tonight and foster your courage!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Okay!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Hmm. Food starts selling at 10, and we're supposed to take turns making rounds in the festival.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Ugh, I'm supposed to be sleeping, but I can't stop thinking about tomorrow!)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Huh? Y-Yes? Come in.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Who could that be at this hour?)

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Evening!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hey Chika! What's up?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: *Nervous laugh* I couldn't sleep because I'm so excited about tomorrow. Sorry, did I wake you up?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: No, I can't sleep at all. I'm worried I might be up all night.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Hahaha! Okay, why don't we talk?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Sure, no problem.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: All right! Let me come in then.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I don't have to let you. It's your family's place, right?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: It's my family's, but not mine.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I guess you're right. It is a room for guests.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'm really looking forward to the live show.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Me too! Not just the show, but the whole festival will be so fun and wonderful!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah, I get that feeling too.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Thanks for talking with me about the song. I was able to finish it thanks to you.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: What? I barely did anything though. I was only able to say that about the festival because you all let me help out.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: I guess so. But if you weren't around, I wouldn't have been able to finish it.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: It may have been completed in a different way if you weren't here, but I think the song written because you were here is the best.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: So, thank you.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Just like Chika said, when people meet, something new is created. I'm sure that applies to school idols, too.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Chika said she finished the song because I was there. The final piece to the Summer Festival was born from Aqours and I meeting.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Aqours was prepping for the festival. She was just in the middle of writing the song when I came "here.")

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (I think... No, I'm certain it means something. Maybe it means that I've entered the circle that connects the world of school idols.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I should be the one thanking you. I'm glad to have been involved with one of Aqours' songs. We'll make the big day a success. I'll support you till the very end!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Thanks! Let's make the festival and show a success!
